value.description: A pipeline has run successfully, although there are failed activities within the pipeline
value.query:
let ActivityRuns = ADFActivityRun
| where Status == 'Failed'
| project ActivityName, ResourceId, PipelineRunId, ActivityStatus = Status;
ADFPipelineRun
| join(ActivityRuns) on $left.ResourceId == $right.ResourceId and $left.RunId == $right.PipelineRunId
| where Status == 'Succeeded'
| where ActivityStatus == 'Failed'
value.emailSubject: Data factory successful pipeline contains failing activity

value.description: A pipeline runs between 25% and 50% slower than last run
value.query:
ADFPipelineRun
| where Status in ('Succeeded', 'Failed')
| where OperationName contains 'Succeeded' or OperationName contains 'Failed'
| project Duration = End - Start, PipelineName, TimeGenerated
| order by PipelineName, TimeGenerated asc nulls last
| project DeltaDuration = Duration - prev(Duration), PrevPipelineName = prev(PipelineName), Duration, PipelineName, TimeGenerated|| where DeltaDuration between ((0.25 * Duration) .. (0.4999 * Duration)) and PipelineName == PrevPipelineName
value.emailSubject: Data factory pipeline runs between 25% and 50% slower
